# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(Python3 REQUIRED)

add_executable(record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp)


target_link_libraries(record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  build-cow-on
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  yt-yt-client
)

target_allocator(record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/cpp/test_simple_mapping.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.record.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.record.h
)


add_test(
  NAME
  record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp
  COMMAND
  record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp
)

set_property(
  TEST
  record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)

set_property(
  TEST
  record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.record.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.record.h
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.yaml
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/__init__.py
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/templates/cpp.j2
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/templates/h.j2
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/lib/__init__.py
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/bin/__main__.py
  WORKING_DIRECTORY
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen
  COMMAND
  ${Python3_EXECUTABLE}
  -B
  -m
  yt_record_codegen.bin
  --input
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.yaml
  --output-root
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  --output-cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/tools/record_codegen/yt_record_codegen/tests/records/simple_mapping.record.cpp
  --output-include
  library/cpp/yt/yson_string/string.h
)

vcs_info(record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp)

set_property(
  TEST
  record_codegen-yt_record_codegen-tests-cpp
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
